description: Reference patterns for composing layout and components. Use these as guidelinesâ€”pick the pattern that fits your app type, then adapt layout and content.

patterns.name: Claims portal
patterns.description: Dashboard with metrics, data table, filters, activity feed, assignee workload
patterns.structure: header-light + sidebar-fixed + main-with-sidebar | page-header | metric-grid (4 cols) | content-grid (table + panel) | two-col-grid (assignees + tasks)

patterns.name: Underwriter workbench
patterns.description: Queue + detail layout, compact header, list selection
patterns.structure: header-dark + sidebar + content (list-panel + detail-panel) | list-panel: search-bar, filter-row, list-cards | detail-panel: entity-header, steps, cards-grid

patterns.name: Sales portal
patterns.description: Pipeline view, deal cards, metrics, light header with search
patterns.structure: header-light + sidebar + main | page-header | metric-grid | pipeline/kanban or content-grid with deal cards

patterns.name: Internal admin tool
patterns.description: Data-heavy, tables, bulk actions, compact header
patterns.structure: header-dark + sidebar + main | tabs | page-header + actions | data-table with filters-bar, row-actions, pagination

headerVariants.header-dark: Primary color bar, compact (52px). Use for focused internal tools.
headerVariants.header-light: White bar with accent border, search, avatar (60px). Use for portals with global search.
